testcase.name: Search a product and add the first product to the User basket
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the login page..........................................passed When I submit username and password.........................................passed Then I should be logged in..................................................passed Given User search for Lenovo Laptop.........................................passed When Add the first laptop that appears in the search result to the basket...passed Then User basket should display with added item.............................passed
